text: I think so, Brain, but where are we going to find a duck and a hose at this hour?
I think so, but where are we going to find an open tattoo parlor at this time of night?
I think so, Brain, but if we didn't have ears, we'd look like weasels.
Uh... yeah, Brain, but where are we going to find rubber pants our size?
Uh, I think so, Brain, but balancing a family and a career... ooh, it's all too much for me.
Wuh, I think so, Brain, but isn't Regis Philbin already married?
Wuh, I think so, Brain, but burlap chafes me so.
Sure, Brain, but how are we going to find chaps our size?
Uh, I think so, Brain, but we'll never get a monkey to use dental floss.
Uh, I think so, Brain, but this time, you wear the tutu.
I think so, Brain, but culottes have a tendancy to ride up so.
